title: FC Erpeldange 72
text:
Football Club 72 Ierpeldeng or FC 72 Erpeldange is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="football%20club">club</a>, based in <a href="Erpeldange">Erpeldange</a>, in north-eastern <a href="Luxembourg">Luxembourg</a>. They play in the third tier <a href="Luxembourg%201.%20Division">Luxembourg 1. Division</a>.
FC 72 Erpeldange play their home games at the Stade An Der Trell.
